column4: UIDAI has made it clear that only a few documents like pancard applicable to apply Aadhar card .

text: @minitlo When it comes to ID proof only a few documents like voter/PAN /passport
column4: bank pass book
column5: credit card st be considered as ID proof

text: @minitlo basically during emergency they need my spouse cell number and present address not the permanent address mention on the Aadhar card
@minitlo my point is till last month a pan card was a very valid document to stay in hotels and enter airports Now suddenly I need diff docu
@minitlo more over we shift home for kids education or job to a new rented apt in a new town That address will not show on your Aadhar card
@minitlo without proper address tax and financial dealings can not happen . So I believe PAN card is an important document .
@minitlo but it was not been asked till last week Address we fill in as during tax and passport taking time we would have given old address
@molarcannine sure
@sarvasharavind dude I have stayed all my life in hotels.. Never faced an issue .. Pan card is not given for free .
@sarvasharavind just because I happen to be a celebrity in your eyes doesn't mean you can say anything . I follow rules of my nation
@sarvasharavind brother I m saying this because all these while I have been using my pan card to enter airport and hotels .I m a common man
@molarcannine for that card I went twice .. Yet to come
Aadhar card or driving licence is a must to stay in Oberoi hotels Pan card has no address so no value Isn't it also given by our government
I have to carry my passport to check in hotels in india .PAN card has no value I guess . 40% income tax gone waste ..
